mapper.select:
select SUM(tmpcount) from ( select count(t1.id) AS tmpcount from project_application t1 where is_delete='0' and status!='0'
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and construction_mode like "%" #{constructionMode} "%"
and investor like "%" #{investor} "%"
UNION ALL select count(t2.id) as tmpcount from project_application t2 where is_delete='0' and status='0' and creater=#{ownerId}
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and construction_mode like "%" #{constructionMode} "%"
and investor like "%" #{investor} "%" ) A

select Id, investment_id, project_code,project_id, project_name, project_type, investor, organization, leval, investment_amount, range1, application_amount, project_desc, kickoff_date, remark, creater, create_time, update_time, enable, file_url, status, is_delete from project_application where is_delete='0' and status!='0'
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization = #{organization}
and construction_mode like "%" #{constructionMode} "%"
and investor like "%" #{investor} "%"
UNION ALL select Id, investment_id, project_code,project_id, project_name, project_type, investor, organization, leval, investment_amount, range1, application_amount, project_desc, kickoff_date, remark, creater, create_time, update_time, enable, file_url, status, is_delete from project_application
where is_delete='0' and status='0' and creater=#{ownerId}
and project_code like "%" #{projectCode} "%"
and project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and project_type like "%" #{projectType} "%"
and organization like "%" #{organization} "%"
and construction_mode like "%" #{constructionMode} "%"
and investor like "%" #{investor} "%"
order by create_time desc limit #{rowNum},#{pageCount}

select Id, investment_id, project_code,project_id, project_name, project_type, investor, organization,construction_mode, leval, investment_amount, range1, application_amount, project_desc, kickoff_date, remark, creater, create_time, update_time, enable, file_url, status, is_delete from project_application a where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update project_application set is_delete='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from project_application where is_delete="0" and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y')=#{niandu} and project_code is not null
